title: Kevin Devine
itunes:title: Kevin Devine
description:
Episode 226 - Kevin Devine. That name should mean something to you and if it doesn’t then listen up. He’s a Brooklyn based singer-songwriter-artist-cool dude that previously played in a band called The Miracle of 86. He’s incredibly thoughtful and I loved every moment of this conversation. We discussed radical ideas, the business of music and transitions. Really compelling stuff so dive in and learn a thing or two. Check out Holy Pinto and their incredible full length called “Congratulations”.Use our Amazon Affiliate Code to support the show!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
